content.question: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. Protein synthesis is vital for cell growth and metabolism. (a) Describe transcription and translation.

frqParts.text: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. Protein synthesis is vital for cell growth and metabolism. (a) Describe transcription and translation.
(b) Identify similarities between transcription and translation.
(c) Identify differences between transcription and translation.
(d) Describe structural changes that can occur to a protein after translation to make it function properly.
